## ShaderHelper.encodeColorOutput() method

Transform color to sRGB color space if nessesary

**Signature:**

```typescript
static encodeColorOutput(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, outputColor: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  outputColor | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The color to be transformed |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The transformed color
